tool.name: MutCount
tool.command:
#if str($method.method_run) == "concat" :
python $__tool_directory__/mutcount_pairs.py $method.num_sampled $method.num_iter $method.list_species && python $__tool_directory__/codoncountingv3.py ${method.zip_nuc} #end if
#if str($method.method_run) == "separated" :
#if str($method.format.format_run)== "nucleic" : python $__tool_directory__/Study_seq_composition_NUC_v3.1.py ${method.format.zip_nuc} ${method.format.concat_nuc} && zip -r multigenes_nucleic.zip OUT/ #end if #if str($method.format.format_run)== "proteic" : cp $__tool_directory__/01_AminoAcid_Properties2.csv . && python $__tool_directory__Study_seq_composition_AA_v4.1.py ${method.format.zip_aa} ${method.format.concat_prot} && zip -r multigenes_proteic.zip OUT/ #end if #end if

param.name: method_run
param.label: Which method do you want to use for this tool?
param.option: Concatenated genes in DNA (concatenation from RAxML run)
Set of separated genes (from ORF_Search output "output zip containing files with CDS without indel")

param.name: zip_nuc
param.label: Choose your fasta file in nucleic format
param.help: It must contain the concatenated file in NUCLEIC format from Phylogeny tool

param.name: list_species
param.label: List of species
param.help: List the species separated with a comma (for e.g Ap,As,Ct,Gt,Yu)

param.name: format_run
param.label: Which format do you want to use for this tool (concatenation and RAxML run) ?

param.name: zip_nuc
param.label: Choose your ZIP file
param.help: It must contain the concatenated file in NUCLEIC format from ORF_search tool

param.name: concat_nuc
param.label: Concatenated file from Phylogeny step
param.help: This file is used to retrieve the species names

param.name: zip_aa
param.label: Choose your ZIP file
param.help: It must contain the concatenated file in PROTEIC format from ORF_search tool

param.name: concat_prot
param.label: concatenated file from Phylogeny step
param.help: This file is used to retrieve the species names
